reviews.review_msg: Honestly I could not upstanding him. Disorganized and confused. Did not follow outline. Really bad

If you take his class, you will have a class with 10 minute quiz, 2.5 hours of his personal stories and experience about his business, soldier, teacher, student life, and 30 minute reading the PowerPoint. He tried to make jokes that are not funny. He use unreasonable time zone (GMT-4) for submitting assignment without noticing.

the most unprofessional instructor ive seen in my life. he doesnt know how to talk about women, he doesnt know how to teach, he is the least understanding person and he doesnt care about you. waste of time and money

A great professor who is kind and helpful. He knows what he's talking about and he has a lot of experience working in the industry, hence many examples from his practical knowledge during the lectures. The lecture can sometimes run dry but he always tries his best to make up for it with class activities.
